signup.success: We've sent you an email with instructions to join our community. Please do have a look!
signup.heading: Join us with youy email address
signup.providersText: Or use one of our providers:

signin.heading: Log in with your email address
signin.providersText: Or use one of our providers:

errors.needLoginViaProvider:google: It seems that account is bound with a Google account.
errors.emailNotExists: We did not find any account associated with given credentials. Please try again.
errors.passwordRegexInvalid:
Password must have:
  1. At least 8 characters long.
  2. Contains at least one lowercase letter.
  3. Contains at least one uppercase letter.
  4. Contains at least one digit.
  5. Contains at least one special character (e.g., !@#$%^&*).
